marklogic.body:
Ironically in Winnifred Blevin's history of the mountain men, "Give Your Heart to the Hawks" he claimed the mountain men routinely referred to each other as "niggur" and "coon" regardless of race.
The mountain men Era ended about 1840, about the year of Huck and African-American Jim's raft trip.
Hey, it doesn't matter. If anyone can actually read Huckleberry Finn and concluce it's a racist book, the educational system has obviously failed them and they should be assigned material more appropriate to their level.
"See Spot run, Run Spot run."
